Name: zul-iqembulezifundi
Author: Iqembu Lezifundiswa, Mussa Muhammad Telela , Uthman Mfanafuthi Msomi, Moulana Abdur Rahman Chilipa, Haji Ibrahim Mondli Japhet Mthembu, Moulana Imran Ngcobo, Moulana Eshaaq Osman
Source: Islamic Dawah Movement of Southern Africa(IDM), https://www.alqurantranslation.com/

Translations.Text: Futhi kuyena (uMvelinqangi) kunokunye ukuvezwa (indalo noma ukuvuswa kwabafileyo)
Nokuthi yena (uMvelinqangi) uyiNkosi ye-As’shiri (inkanyezi eyayikhonzwa yingxenye yama-Arab)
Kanye nabantu baNowa (babhujiswa) ngaphambilini, ngempela bona babengenabo ubulungiswa ngokudlulele futhi bephula umthetho ngokudlulele
Ngakho-ke yikuphi kobubele beNkosi yakho okungabazayo na
Futhi uma bebona uphawu bayafulathela futhi bathi, “(lona) ngumlingo oqhubekayo”
Futhi baziphika (izimpawu zikaMvelinqangi) base belandela izinkanuko zabo, kepha zonke izindaba ziyohlelwa (uma sekufika isikhathi sazo)
Futhi ngempela sezafika kubona izindaba ezixwayisayo nezinezifundo
Ubuhlakani obuhle, kepha (ukushumayela) kwabaxwayisi akuzange kubasize
Ngakho-ke qhelelana nabo, bese ukhumbule usuku lapho ummemi eyomemela entweni embi kakhulu (esabisayo)
